lead_paragraph: FIFA's former secretary general Jerome Valcke has had his ban from football cut from 12 to 10 years on appeal.

headline.print_headline: Former FIFA Official Valcke Gets Ethics Ban Cut by 2 Years
headline.main: Former FIFA Official Valcke Gets Ethics Ban Cut by 2 Years
